Title: Increases the penalties for certain crimes involving tampering with a witness or intimidating a victim or witness
Summary: Increases the penalties for certain crimes involving tampering with a witness or intimidating a victim or witness; increases the penalty for tampering with a witness in the third degree and intimidating a victim or witness in the third degree to class D felonies; increases the penalty for tampering with a witness in the second degree and intimidating a victim or witness in the second degree to class C felonies.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to increasing the penalties for certain crimes involving tampering with a witness or intimidating a victim or witness
